channel.title: [PS3] NHL 12 freezing like a icecube on crack
channel.description:
I recently bought NHL12 on the PS3. The first few days I just spent my time playing regular games against the AI as well as toying around in the practice modes.
But today I wanted to start a Be A Pro game, and it keeps freezing either mid-game or during the loading of an autosave. Everything just stops moving, only the camera seems to finish the animation it had started when the game had the fit. The buttons aren't responsive anymore apart from the PS Home button to quit the game.
This is the actual game freezing, not the console. I can still go back to the PS3's main menu and play a demo or whatever without actually resetting the console.
Does anyone else have this problem with NHL12 or any other EA Sports '12 game and now how to fix it (if at all)?

item.title: [PS3] NHL 12 freezing like a icecube on crack
item.dc:creator: SkaningeN
item.description:
Im a huge hockeyfan and I buy NHL every year for PS3.

To fix the issue when the game freezes during loading one of your saved files, don’t sign in to playstation network or shut down the internet connection.

For the game freezing during gameplay. It has happened a couple of times for me aswell, nothing you can do really. But for me it does not happen that often and I still use the bigger version of the PS3, not slim. We can’t expect any more updates to the game anymore so I think you just need to live with it Im afraid.
